title: Champion Concept: Emrys, The Relentless Blade
body:
Emrys, The Relentless Blade
AD Assassin

Lore
Growing up on the streets of Noxus, Emrys learnt that relentless ambition was a sure way to survive. After being caught for theft and later again for murder, a captain in the Noxian army recruited him in favour of dealing him a death sentence to utilize his skills for the benefit of Noxus. In his service, Emrys fought alongside Darius and was noted for his relentlessness in battle. 

During Darius' purge on Noxus, Emrys was tasked with eliminating those on the list who fled the city and cut off the escape of those who were confronted by the Hand of Noxus.

He was rewarded by the possession of one of his targets, a rare magical blade that craved blood gifting its wielder with the means to feed it. Emrys entered the League of Legends to sate the hunger of his blade and rid the world of those not worthy of his challenge.

Stats 
HP - 480 + 90/lvl
HP Regen - 7 + 0.7/lvl
Att Dmg - 50 + +3.5/lvl
Att Spd - 0.666 + 2.8%/lvl
Move Spd - 350
Armour - 23 + 3.5/lvl
Mag Res - 30 + 1.25/lvl

Recommended Items
Boots of Swiftness
Phantom Dancer
Infinity Edge
Youmuu's Ghostblade
Spirit Visage
The Bloodthirster

Abilities
Passive - Living Blade
With each enemy kill or assist, Emrys' living blade grows stronger increasing attack speed and life steal by 1%

Q - Quick Draw / Back Stab
Cooldown - 10/9/8/7/6 seconds, Range - 660 
Emrys quickly draws his flintlock pistol and fires a shot off at an enemy unit/champion, silencing them for 2 seconds.
If Emrys uses this ability again on the same target in the next 3 seconds, he blinks behind the target and stabs them in the back for 30/60/90/120/150 bonus damage.

W - Woven Fear
Cooldown - 10/9/8/7/6 seconds, Range - 660
Emrys loads a special slug into his flintlock pistol and fires it at an enemy champion for 20/40/60/80/100 bonus damage. After 3 seconds the victim suffers from a hallucinating  poison, fearing them for 2 seconds.

E - Eviscerate
Recharge Rate - 8 seconds, Range - 330
Emrys ruthlessly slashes and stabs at a target enemy champion dealing 30/60/90/120/150 bonus damage plus 1%/2%/3%/4%/5% of their missing health. If the target has less then 40% health Eviscerate boosts Emrys attack speed by 10%/15%/20%/25%/30% for 4 seconds.

The Eviscerate ability consumes charges which are passively generated every 8 seconds. The maximum amount of charges available is equal the to the number of ranks in Eviscerate.

R - Relentless Rush
Cooldown - 88/80/72 seconds
Emrys breaks free of all slows and immobilizes, rushing with a ravenous haste increasing his movement speed by 15%/30%/45% for the next 8 seconds. Whilst his Relentless Rush is active Eviscerate no longer consumes charges and he is immune to immobilize effects.

replies.body: That is a looooooooooot of CC and Utility for an AD Assassin...
